markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = LAX02_tsk_pilgrim_threat | guid = f9c28088-417d-430d-bff5-26ac4008104d }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBeastOfWinter/) in {{bow}}. ## Synopsis [Harbinger Brythe](/harbingerBrythe/) has asked the Watcher to take care of a problem facing the Rymrgand worshippers of Harbingers' Watch - the cultists that arrived at the Dead Floe before them. These pilgrims have set up camp above the Watch and attack anything they see. ## Walkthrough * To access the [Outcrop on High](/outcropOnHigh/), you need to complete the first quest in the area, [An Honored Guest](/anHonoredGuest/), and receive [Vatnir's icepicks](/vatnirsIcepicks/). Then it's a simple matter of heading to the Outcrop, finding the pilgrims in the center, and wiping them out. (First sneak around to the west and then north to find a [Sigil of Pain Wardstone](/sigilOfPainWardstone/) in a chest, then continue clockwise to fight the pilgrims near the Sigil of Pain.) Be sure to collect the Horns of the Aurochs before you leave! * Talk to Brythe. As it turns out, she didn't expect you to ''kill everyone'', as befitting the Duskspeaker. She will reveal that she was hoping that she could be reconciled with her sister, Ehrys, who was always the surer and smarter of those two. [Ydwin](/ydwin/) will comment on Brythe afterwards, noting that she thinks herself half as clever as she is - and doesn't understand how much cleverer she will have to be. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX02_01_Iceberg_Dungeon/LAX02_tsk_pilgrim_threat.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Higher-Ups''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Harbinger Brythe has asked me to take care of a problem facing the Rymrgand worshippers of Harbingers' Watch - the cultists that arrived at the Dead Floe before them. These pilgrims have set up camp above the Watch and attack anything they see. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Defeat the pilgrims at Outcrop on High.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Hostile pilgrims have established a camp between Harbingers' Watch and Rymrgand's temple. I'll need to defeat them if I'm to secure the Watch's safety - or a safe path to the Vytmádh. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I stand little chance of making the climb to Outcrop on High without specialized equipment. The High Harbinger may have something that will help me make the ascent. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I acquired ice picks from Vatnir. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with Brythe at Harbingers' Dwelling.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I should let Brythe know that the pilgrims are no longer a threat. She's likely in the ice fishing grotto in Harbingers' Watch. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed the fanatical pilgrims at Outcrop on High. |}

title: The Higher-Ups
